thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Apology to Ronnie Kasrils

author: news24.com
title: Apology to Ronnie Kasrils
text:
On Friday, 11th September 2015 an article/public statement appeared on MyNews24/News24, making certain statements regarding Mr Ronnie Kasrils, former Minister of Intelligence, under the heading " Final attempt at opinion freedom " - an article submitted by a user on MyNews24.
The aforesaid allegations are false, offensive and unacceptable. We have removed the statements from our website and archives and hereby retract the contents of such statement and irrevocably and unconditionally apologise to Mr Ronnie Kasrils.
